abstract: Relativity Media, the privately-held film financing company, will bring in more than $2 billion in revenue for the first time this year, its chief executive, Ryan Kavanaugh, said Tuesday.
snippet: Relativity Media, the privately-held film financing company, will bring in more than $2 billion in revenue for the first time this year, its chief executive, Ryan Kavanaugh, said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Relativity Media, the privately held film financing company, will bring in more than $2 billion in revenue for the first time this year, its chief executive, Ryan Kavanaugh, said Tuesday, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Relativity to Exceed $2 Billion in Revenue, Chief Says
